label: ContentUnderstandingSkill
description: A skill that leverages Azure AI Content Understanding to process and extract structured insights from documents, enabling enriched, searchable content for enhanced document indexing and retrieval.

fields.label: Chunking Properties
fields.tooltip: Controls the cardinality for chunking the content.

fields.label: Context
fields.tooltip: Represents the level at which operations take place, such as the document root or document content (for example, /document or /document/content). The default is /document.

fields.label: Description
fields.tooltip: The description of the skill which describes the inputs, outputs, and usage of the skill.

fields.label: Extraction Options
fields.tooltip: Controls the cardinality of the content extracted from the document by the skill.

fields.label: Inputs
fields.tooltip: Inputs of the skills could be a column in the source data set, or the output of an upstream skill.

fields.label: Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the skill which uniquely identifies it within the skillset. A skill with no name defined will be given a default name of its 1-based index in the skills array, prefixed with the character '#'.

fields.label: Outputs
fields.tooltip: The output of a skill is either a field in a search index, or a value that can be consumed as an input by another skill.
